summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2807, for the improvement of West Morgan Street, from 35th Avenue Southwest to California Avenue, by grading, constructing curbs and gutters, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 33660 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
